ITP Valids.Validation Description: Agency reason for change must be provided for eliminated investments
If StatusIdentifier = 10 (New), then there should not be a PriorUII provided. Message is, "Error: New investments cannot have a PriorUII"
For downgraded investments please ensure the Prior UII used to identify the previous investment is of type '01'.
ITP Valids.Comments: Downgrading previously only occurred from Major to Non-Major. Need to determine if moving from an 01 or an 02 to a 05 or 06 is considered a downgrade or not? ACTION

ITP Valids.FY19 Field: Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category
ITP Valids.Validation Description: At least one investment in the agency's IT portfolio with Type of Investment '01' or '02'and Change in Investment Status Identifier is '1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '10', or '11' must have Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category as '03'.
ITP Valids.Comments: Indicates that at least one non-eliminated investment must be an IT Management Investment. Also states that investment must be a major or non-major. Need to determine if this should be restricted to only 05 types, if 05 types should be added to the list of types for the validation or it the validation should be removed. ACTION

ITP Valids.FY19 Field: Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category
ITP Valids.Validation Description: At least one major investment in the agency's IT portfolio with Type of Investment '01' and Change in Investment Status Identifier is '1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '10', or '11' must have Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category as '02'.
ITP Valids.Comments: Update. At least one investment in the agency's IT portofolio with Type 05, and Change in Investment Status Identifier is '1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '10', or '11' must have IT Standard IT Infrastructure and Mangement Category as '02.

ITP Valids.FY19 Field: Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category
ITP Valids.Validation Description: At least one investment in the agency's IT portfolio must have Type of Investment '05', Change in Investment Status Identifier '1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '10', or '11', and Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category '02'
ITP Valids.Comments: Update previous validation since security investments should no longer be major investments. Updated validation to state must be type 05.

ITP Valids.FY19 Field: Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category
ITP Valids.Validation Description: Every investment with Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category = ‘02’ must have Type of Investment = 05.
ITP Valids.Comments: Updated. Security investments must be type 05 now since security investments are standard investments.

ITP Valids.FY19 Field: Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category
ITP Valids.Validation Description: For investments with Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category as '02' and Type on Investment as '01', '02', or '03', the sum of the Total IT Security Spending for the CY and BY must be greater than 0.
ITP Valids.Comments: Remove. Security Investments (02  Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category) now must be type 05.

ITP Valids.FY19 Field: Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category
ITP Valids.Validation Description: For investments with Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category as '02' and Type on Investment as '05', the sum of the Total IT Security and Compliance Cost Tower for the CY and BY must be greater than 0.
ITP Valids.Comments: Total IT Security and Compliance cost will replace Total IT Security Spending in the validation.

ITP Valids.Validation Description: Agency Code in UII and Investment Bureau Code should be a valid combination for the Investment with UII Y
ITP Valids.Comments: Agency code and Bureau code should be a valid combination. An Agency cannot be enter a bureau code that is not linked to that agency.

ITP Valids.Validation Description: The system has recognized a mismatch in the agency code value entered as first three digits of UII. Please ensure the first three digits represent the agency code that matches with the submitting agency user
ITP Valids.Comments: Agency code and Bureau code should be a valid combination. An Agency cannot be enter a bureau code that is not linked to that agency.

ITP Valids.Validation Description: The investment with CurrentUII X is present more than once in the submitted IT Portfolio
ITP Valids.Comments: Each UII can only be submitted once to the IT Portfolio

ITP Valids.Validation Description: The provided CurrentUII XXX-XXXXXXXXX cannot change from last year's value of XXX-XXXXXXXXX if the Change in Status Identifier is not a split, consolidation or reorganization.
The system has recognized that Current UII X does not match the guidelines defined in the IT Portfolio.
ITP Valids.Comments: UII is not structured or submitted to the IT Portfolio based on the guidelines and struture provided in the guidance.

ITP Valids.Validation Description: CurrentUII XXX-XXXXXXXX appears to be a continuing investment that was submitted in the prior budget year, though the PriorUII in the current submission is blank
New investments cannot have a Prior UII.
Prior UII cannot be null when StatusIdentifier equals 6,7,8,9
ITP Valids.Comments: An Investment must havea prior UII if it is being eliminated.

ITP Valids.Validation Description: PriorUII must correspond to an active investment from the prior budget year submission
The system has recognized that Prior UII X does not match the guidelines defined in the IT Portfolio.
ITP Valids.Comments: Prior UII is not structured or submitted to the IT Portfolio based on the guidelines and struture provided in the guidance.

ITP Valids.Validation Description: Shared Services Identifier is required and must be one of the E-Gov/LOB codes for investments with Shared Services Category as '24'.
Shared Services Identifier is required and must be one of the USSM codes for investments with Shared Services Category as '36'.
Shared Services Identifier is required for investments with Shared Services Category as '48'.
Shared Services Identifier should not be provided for investments with Shared Services Category as '00'.

ITP Valids.FY19 Field: Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category
ITP Valids.Validation Description: For investments with Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category of '05', agencies should also provide a valid Data Center ID from their IDC data center inventory.

ITP Valids.FY19 Field: Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category
ITP Valids.Validation Description: Investments characterized as Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category '02, '03', '04',' 05', or '06' must also have Type of Investment '05'.
Investments characterized as Type of Investment '05' must also have Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category '02, '03', '04','05', or '06'.
Investments characterized as Type of Investment '01', '02', '03', '04', or '06' must also have Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category '01'.
Only numeric values with decimals can be entered in decimal fields. Up to 12 digits before the decimal and up to 6 digits after the decimal. All entered digits must be between 0 and 9.
ITP Valids.Comments: This is a structual validation that is used on decimal fields throughout the dashboard. Since it is used so many times, the digit counts before and after the decimal allow for flexibility when used for a variety of reasons.

ITP Valids.Validation Description: Cost Pool/Tower amount are reported in millions and must be less than 10000
ITP Valids.Comments: Validation will only throw an error if a number representing an amount over 10 billion dollars is entered into the system. This will cap agencies from entering amounts in thousands.

ITP Valids.Validation Description: Part 3 Type 5 Investments category '05' must have one Data Center ID.
The system has recognized the Data Center ID in Prior UII and does not allow duplication of Data Center ID within the same investment.
ITP Valids.Comments: Disallow duplicate Data Center IDs within the same investment

ITP Valids.Validation Description: Data Center ID must match “DCOI-XX-123456” where “XX” is a state abbreviation
ITP Valids.Comments: Format must match “DCOI-XX-12345” where “XX” is a state abbreviation

ITP Valids.FY19 Field: Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category
ITP Valids.Validation Description: For investments with Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category as '02' the Total IT Security Spending for PY (0) must be equal to the sum of DME and O&M Agency PY Security Funding.
ITP Valids.Comments: Removing this validation as there is no Security funding and it will require code change because the sum of DME and O&M is incorrect it should be less than or equal to.

ITP Valids.FY19 Field: Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category
ITP Valids.Validation Description: For investments with Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category as '02' the Total IT Security Spending for CY (0) must be equal to the sum of DME and O&M Agency CY Security Funding.
ITP Valids.Comments: Removing this validation as there is no Security funding and it will require code change because the sum of DME and O&M is incorrect it should be less than or equal to.

ITP Valids.FY19 Field: Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category
ITP Valids.Validation Description: For investments with Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category as '02' the Total IT Security Spending for BY (0) must be equal to the sum of DME and O&M Agency BY Security Funding.
ITP Valids.Comments: Removing this validation as there is no Security funding and it will require code change because the sum of DME and O&M is incorrect it should be less than or equal to.

ITP Valids.FY19 Field: Standard IT Infrastructure and Management Category
ITP Valids.Validation Description:
At least one investment per agency must exist with Standard
IT Infrastructure and Management Category = “02: sum of Total IT Security and Compliance Cost” AND with sum of Total IT Security Spending for CY and BY greater
than 0

ITP Valids.FY19 Field: Cost Pool: Total Internal Labor (Government FTE) Cost (CY/2018)
ITP Valids.Validation Description: Government FTE Percent Costs CY cannot be a negative value for investment with UII XXX-XXXXXXXX
